overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Backend-oriented full-stack software developer focused on building reliable systems with clear boundaries, predictable behavior, and long-term maintainability. I design and implement end-to-end applications, with a primary focus on APIs, distributed services, and infrastructure-aware systems where correctness and operational clarity matter.

profile.title: Profile
profile.text: I design and implement full-stack applications using C#, Java, SQL, and modern frontend frameworks, with backend architecture, data modeling, and service contracts as the foundation. My work spans API design, distributed workflows, and user-facing interfaces, ensuring that frontend and backend evolve coherently within well-defined system boundaries.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.text: I favor explicit architectures over implicit behavior. Systems should be understandable, observable, and resilient under failure. Clear responsibilities, deterministic flows, and documented constraints matter more to me than rapid feature accumulation.

systems.title: Systems
systems.intro: I design software as layered systems with explicit responsibilities and well-defined boundaries. Each layer is isolated, testable, and constrained by clear contracts to ensure predictability, maintainability, and long-term evolution.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: State-driven client responsible for presentation and user interaction. It consumes explicit APIs, avoids business logic, and ensures deterministic navigation and predictable UI behavior.

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: Core system layer owning business rules, data consistency, workflows, and authorization. Services expose predictable APIs, enforce invariants, and coordinate state transitions.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.text: Supports the system through reproducible deployments, logging, monitoring, and security. Infrastructure is treated as a first-class concern to ensure reliability and controlled failure modes.

skills_catalog.intro: Core technical capabilities I actively design and build with. Each skill represents a broader capability rather than a single tool.

items.name: Backend Architecture
items.description: Design of backend systems with clear service boundaries, explicit business rules, data invariants, authorization logic, and predictable workflows. Focused on correctness, maintainability, and long-term evolution.

items.name: API Design
items.description: Design and implementation of REST and GraphQL APIs with explicit contracts, validation, versioning, and documentation. APIs are treated as stable system boundaries.

items.name: Distributed Systems
items.description: Coordination of state and workflows across distributed services, with attention to consistency, failure handling, and observability.

items.name: Databases & Data Modeling
items.description: Relational and document databases with emphasis on schema design, indexing strategies, migrations, query optimization, and data integrity.

items.name: Containers & Deployment
items.description: Containerized services and environments to ensure reproducible builds, consistent deployments, and clear separation between runtime concerns.

items.name: CI / CD
items.description: Automated build, test, and deployment pipelines with controlled release workflows and environment parity.

items.name: Linux & Servers

items.name: Security & Identity

items.name: Testing & Quality
items.description: Unit, integration, and end-to-end testing with an emphasis on reliability, maintainability, and confidence in system behavior.

items.name: Frontend Engineering
